name: UV DLP Slicer Controller
tagline: A slicer and print controller for UV DLP based 3d printers
body:
### Welcome to Creation Workshop
This is the 3dDLPUVController project, also known as CreationWorkshop

This software allows you to create cross-sectional image slices of 3d Binary STL models. 
It also allows you to generate GCode and to control a variety of 3d DLP UV printers via serial interfaces using RAMPs-like hardware.

I used C# to code this project along with Visual Studio 2010. Linux and Mac is supported via MONO (but may not be fully tested)

### Support or Contact
Having trouble with Pages? Check out the documentation at http://help.github.com/pages or contact support@github.com and weâ€™ll help you sort it out.
